about_the_game:
Just keep climbing.
Avoid falling rocks, climb cliffs and reach the goal.

All you can do is move, dash, and jump.

This game is a time attack type 3D action game that challenges you to reach the goal as fast as possible with simple controls.

Keyboard Operation Guide

*Play with a controller is recommended.
Move W/A/S/D
Jump Space
Run Shift
Crouch Alt
Camera Arrow keys

About Video Distribution

・Distribution is available to both individuals and corporations without permission.
・Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.
・We would appreciate it if you include the name of the game in the title of your video or live broadcast, or include a link to the Steam page in the summary section.

We will not be liable for any damages caused by the distribution of videos of this game.
The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.

Translated with (free version)

name: JUMP de PON

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10875H
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
